name: Runner Racer
description:
A short race game made with microstudio.dev

https://microstudio.io/i/Japanch/runnerracer/

It just for testing the engine, but I dont think it will get any big updates unless I learn some new awesome gimmick to spice the gameplay.

It seems the highscore feature only works inside the microstudio enviroment D:> well thats for now!, it gets the job done for a few minutes, hope you enjoy them xD
